name: Planner 5D
description: Planner 5D is an AI-powered home design platform for creating 2D/3D floor plans and interior designs.
longDescription: Planner 5D is an intuitive, AI-driven home design software that enables users to create detailed 2D and 3D floor plans and interior designs without requiring technical expertise. It serves homeowners, interior designers, architects, and real estate professionals by offering tools to visualize and plan spaces, from small apartments to large commercial buildings. The platform supports a vast library of over 8,400 furniture and decor items, allowing users to customize layouts and experiment with styles. Its mission is to simplify the design process, making it accessible to beginners and professionals alike. By integrating AI features like plan recognition and 4K rendering, Planner 5D helps users transform ideas into realistic visualizations. The software is available across multiple platforms, including web, iOS, Android, and Mac, with seamless project synchronization.
features: Create detailed 2D and 3D floor plans with drag-and-drop tools for easy layout design.
Access a catalog of over 8,400 furniture and decor items to customize interior and exterior spaces.
Use AI-powered plan recognition to convert 2D blueprints into editable 3D models instantly.
Generate photorealistic 4K renders to visualize designs with realistic lighting and textures.
Explore virtual walkthroughs and 360° panoramas to experience designs interactively.
Utilize pre-designed templates to quickly start projects tailored to various design styles.
Integrate cost analysis and budget tracking for accurate project cost projections.
Export designs to CAD formats for compatibility with professional software like AutoCAD.

faqs.question: What is Planner 5D used for?
faqs.answer: Planner 5D is used to create 2D and 3D floor plans and interior designs for homes, offices, and landscapes, suitable for both personal and professional use.

faqs.question: Is Planner 5D free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Planner 5D offers a free plan with limited features and a smaller catalog, while premium plans unlock full functionality and the entire item catalog.

faqs.question: Can I use Planner 5D without design experience?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, its user-friendly interface and built-in hint system make it accessible for beginners to create professional-looking designs.

faqs.question: Does Planner 5D support mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Planner 5D is available on iOS and Android, with full synchronization across platforms for seamless project access.

faqs.question: Can I convert my 2D blueprint into a 3D model?
faqs.answer: Yes, Planner 5D’s AI plan recognition feature allows users to upload 2D blueprints and automatically convert them into editable 3D models.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the PRO subscription?
faqs.answer: The PRO subscription offers unlimited renders, 4K visuals, 360° panoramas, custom 3D object uploads, and a personal account manager for professional users.

faqs.question: Can I use Planner 5D for commercial projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, Planner 5D is ideal for commercial projects, offering tools for office layouts, cost tracking, and CAD export for professional workflows.
